feed.title: Infisical Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.125.1-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix KMS memory leak by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3501
  • Infisical SSH: Add Alias Field to SSH Hosts by @dangtony98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3497
  • Implemented project permission impersonation by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3447
  • feat(reminders): specify recipients by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3453
  • feat(project-permissions): allow users to sort permissions on the UI by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3494
  • feat: github org sync by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3498
  • feat: enabled sso (google, gitlab, github) to bypass org sso by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3471
  • feat(login): Update all SSO login methods to use PKCE by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3495
  • feat: increased secret caching to 10mins with jitter of 2min by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3505
  • feat: add support for eddsa jwt alg for oidc by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3503

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.125.0-postgres...infisical/v0.125.1-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.125.2-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(secrets-table): UI fix for users with edit permissions but not read secret value permission by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3478
  • feat: strict find filter by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3506
  • doc: added doc for assume privilege feature by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3504
  • feat(secret-sync): TeamCity ignore inherited and non-env values by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3509
  • fix(external-connections): Use Hostname for Blocking Internal IPs DNS Resolve by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3510

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.125.1-postgres...infisical/v0.125.2-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.125.3-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(secrets-ui): Add direct reference warning on secrets updates and add secret sync warning on deletion by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3491
  • remove _Root filter for projects by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3516
  • feat(user-auth): make users auth token expiration customizable for orgs by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3507
  • Feat/azure client secrets rotation by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3440
  • fix(api): project deletion failing by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3520
  • misc: addressed totp and sms visibility issue by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3527
  • feat(agent): Sync Imported Secrets by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3525
  • feat(workflow-integrations): microsoft teams by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3486
  • feat(secret-sync): Hashicorp Vault App Connection & Secret Sync by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3487
  • Add Github SSO users to default organization on signup by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3531

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.125.2-postgres...infisical/v0.125.3-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.126.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(vite.config): Allowed Hosts Defined Through Env Variable by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3536
  • Infisical SSH - Add Support for Host Groups by @dangtony98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3522
  • feat(helm): infisical gateway helm by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3524
  • improvemet(email-templates): migrate email templates to react email by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3530
  • docs(gateway-helm): helm deployment by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3539
  • fix(external-connections): Use DNS Lookup as Fallback for DNS Resolve by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3545
  • feat(pki): Store Secret Key Alongside Certificate + Endpoints to Fetch PK / Cert Bundle by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3514
  • Add missing HOST environment var by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3547

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.125.3-postgres...infisical/v0.126.0-postgres
